verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> <S%H516>Altaschith,<s%> <S%H4387>Michtam<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> Do you <S%H552>indeed<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> O <S%H482>congregation?<s%> do you <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H4339>uprightly,<s%> O you <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men?<s%>
<S%H637>Yes,<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> you <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H5766>wickedness;<s%> you <S%H6424>weigh<s%> the <S%H2555>violence<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H2114>estranged<s%> from the <S%H7358>womb:<s%> they <S%H8582>go<s%> <S%H8582>astray<s%> as soon as they be <S%H990>born,<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H3576>lies.<s%>

Their <S%H2534>poison<s%> is <S%H1823>like<s%> the <S%H2534>poison<s%> of a <S%H5175>serpent:<s%> they are <S%H3644>like<s%> the <S%H2795>deaf<s%> <S%H6620>adder<s%> that <S%H331>stops<s%> her <S%H241>ear;<s%>
<S%H834>Which<s%> will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3907>charmers,<s%> <S%H2266>charming<s%> <S%H2267><s%> never so <S%H2449>wisely.<s%>

<S%H2040>Break<s%> their <S%H8127>teeth,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> <S%H5422>break<s%> out the <S%H4459>great<s%> <S%H4973>teeth<s%> of the <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lions,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Let them <S%H3988>melt<s%> away as <S%H4325>waters<s%> which <S%H1980>run<s%> continually: when he <S%H1869>bends<s%> his bow to shoot his <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> let them be as <S%H4135>cut<s%> in pieces.

As a <S%H7642>snail<s%> which <S%H8557>melts,<s%> let every one of them <S%H1980>pass<s%> away: like the <S%H5309>untimely<s%> <S%H5309>birth<s%> of a <S%H802>woman,<s%> that they may not <S%H2372>see<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

<S%H2962>Before<s%> your <S%H5518>pots<s%> can <S%H995>feel<s%> the <S%H329>thorns,<s%> he shall <S%H8175>take<s%> them away as with a <S%H8175>whirlwind,<s%> both <S%H2416>living,<s%> and in his <S%H2740>wrath.<s%>

The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H2372>sees<s%> the <S%H5359>vengeance:<s%> he shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H6471>feet<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

So that a <S%H120>man<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H389>Truly<s%> there is a <S%H6529>reward<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous:<s%> <S%H389>truly<s%> he is a <S%H430>God<s%> that <S%H8199>judges<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
